docs.snippet: San Bernardino, already struggling with the specters of bankruptcy and decay, was traumatized by an attack that started indoors and spilled out into the streets....
docs.lead_paragraph: San Bernardino, already struggling with the specters of bankruptcy and decay, was traumatized by an attack that started indoors and spilled out into the streets.
docs.abstract: Residents of San Bernardino, Calif, recall terrifying moments following mass shootings, as entire neighborhoods went into lockdown during day of trauma, fear and confusion.

headline.main: Struggling City Is Traumatized by a Siege and a Loud and Bloody Shootout
headline.print_headline: Struggling City Is Traumatized by a Siege and a Loud and Bloody Shootout
